activity_1_b.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වචන නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_d.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_1_e.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

content.sentence_text: The m'e'ter is in the workshop.
The copper l'ea'd is very clean.
This h'ea'ter is in the classroom.

example.text:
Listen to the model dialogue.
ආදර්ශ සංවාදයට සවන් දෙන්න.
மாதிரி உரையாடலை கேளுங்கள்.

activity_2_a.text:
Match the words with the pictures.
පදයන් පින්තූර සමග ගැලපන්න.
சொற்களைப் படங்களுடன் பொருத்துங்கள்.

activity_2_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_2_d.text:
Read along.
පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න.
ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

activity_2_e.text:
Listen to each question, use the pause to answer it, then compare your response with the model answer.
සෑම ප්‍රශ්නයකටම සවන් දෙන්න, පිළිතුරු දීමට විරාමය භාවිතා කරන්න, ඉන්පසු ඔබේ පිළිතුර ආදර්ශ පිළිතුර සමඟ සසඳන්න.
ஒவ்வொரு கேள்வியையும் கேட்டு, இடைவெளியைப் பயன்படுத்தி பதிலளியுங்கள். பின்னர் உங்கள் பதிலை மாதிரி பதிலுடன் ஒப்பிடுங்கள்.

example_dialogues.text_b: It is in the pencil case.

dialogues.text_a: Where is the heavy distribution board?
dialogues.text_b: It is in the control panel section.

dialogues.text_a: Where is the portable insulation tester?
dialogues.text_b: It is in the grey cotton bag.

dialogues.text_a: Where are the protective rubber gloves?
dialogues.text_b: They are in the black chest.

dialogues.text_a: Where are the new circuit breakers?
dialogues.text_b: They are in the chest of drawers.
He is in the wiring workshop.
They are in the reception area.

activity_1_a.text:
Choose the correct answer.
 නිවැරදි පිළිතුර තෝරන්න.
 சரியான பதிலைத் தேர்ந்தெடுக்கவும்.

examples.sentence:
The correct resistance of this coil is 15 Ω. The multimeter shows 15 Ω.

 The resistance is ………………….

content.sentence:
The correct operating voltage for a circuit is 220–240 volts. The voltage in this circuit is 210 volts.

The voltage in this circuit is ………………….

The correct current for this motor is 10 amperes. The current in this motor is 13 amperes.

The current in this motor is ………………….

The correct insulation resistance in wiring is above 1 megaohm. The insulation resistance in this wiring is 0.5 megaohms.

The insulation resistance in this wiring is ………………….

The correct fuse rating for this circuit is 5 amperes. The fuse in this circuit is 8 amperes.

The fuse in this circuit is ………………….

The correct earth resistance is less than 2 ohms. The earth resistance in this test is 4 ohms.

The earth resistance in this test is ………………….

The correct oil temperature of a transformer is 60 degrees Celsius. The oil temperature of this transformer is 75 degrees Celsius.

 The oil temperature of this transformer is ………………….

The correct cable size for this circuit is 6 square millimeters. The cable in this circuit is 4 square millimeters.

 The cable in this circuit is ………………….

The correct conductor length for this connection is 2 meters. The conductor in this connection is 2.5 meters.

 The conductor in this connection is ………………….

The correct breaker rating for a distribution board is 32 amperes. The breaker in this distribution board is 25 amperes.

 The breaker in this distribution board is ………………….

The correct capacitor value for this motor is 40 microfarads. The capacitor in this motor is 60 microfarads.

 The capacitor in this motor is ………………….

activity_a.text:
Listen to the audio which will be played twice and click on the correct answer. It is very important that you read the questions before you listen to the recording.
ඔබට සෑම පටිගත කිරීමක්ම දෙවරක් ඇසෙනු ඇත. නිවැරදි පිළිතුර ක්ලික් කරන්න. රෙකෝඩින් එක අහන්නට පෙර ප්‍රශ්නය කියවීම ඉතාමත් වැදගත්ය.
ஒவ்வொரு ஒலிப்பதிவையும் நீங்கள் இருமுறை கேட்கலாம். கேட்ட எண்களை குறித்து எழுதுங்கள். பதிவைக் கேட்பதற்கு முன் கேள்விகளைப் படிப்பது மிகவும் முக்கியம்.

activity_c.text:
Listen and repeat.
සවන් දී වාක්‍ය නැවත කියන්න.
கேட்டு மீண்டும் சொல்லுங்கள்.

activity_d.text: Read along. පිටපත සමඟ කියවන්න. ஒரே நேரத்தில் வாசியுங்கள்.

Questions.question: What is the voltage of the single-phase circuit?
What is the correct voltage range?
What is the current of the motor?
What is the correct reading of the insulation resistance?
Where is the test log kept?

activity_b.text: I am checking the voltage of the single-phase circuit.
I am checking the resistance of the heating coil.
I am checking the oil temperature of the transformer.
I am checking the capacitance of the capacitor.
The current is 13 amperes. The current is 3 amperes too high.
The conductor is 2.5 meters. The conductor is 0.5 meters too long.
The oil is 75 degrees Celsius. The oil is 15 degrees Celsius too hot.
The resistance is 0.5 megaohms. The resistance is 0.5 megaohms too low.
The resistance of the heating coil is about 12 ohms.– The resistance of the heating coil is about 2 ohms too high.
The extension cable is about 20 meters.– The extension cable is about 5 meters too long.
The transformer oil is about 75 degrees Celsius. The transformer oil is about 15 degrees Celsius too hot.
The junction box is about 6 centimeters. The junction box is about 2 centimeters too deep.
